column1: 546167: Monthly global seaborne iron ore trade growth indicator based on a “basket” of seaborne trade flows accounting for ~90% of total global seaborne iron ore trade in tonnes. Historical data points basis trade and customs data, with data points for recent months (where ‘official’ data not yet available) estimated from available industry data and data derived from vessel movements.

547347: Monthly global seaborne iron ore trade growth indicator based on a “basket” of seaborne trade flows accounting for ~90% of total global seaborne iron ore trade in tonnes.
